PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 7 shows the current - voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PC71BM |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "LiF" (Lithium fluoride, a material property)
* "Al" (Aluminum, a material property)

The valid entities that clearly refer to "Material property" are:

* "J-V" (Current-voltage characteristics)
* "ITO" (Indium tin oxide)
* "PEDOT" (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
* "PSS" (Polystyrene sulfonate)
* "PC71BM" (Poly[N-9''-heptaethyl-N-9''-propyl-9H-fluorenyl-2,7-diyl-alt-co-1,4-phenylene]-b-co-[N-9''-heptaethyl-N-9''-propyl-9H-fluorenyl-2,7-diyl-alt-co-1,4-phenylene])

Note: "LiF" and "Al" are not clearly referring to material properties in this context, as they could also refer to other things (e.g. lithium fluoride as a chemical compound, aluminum as a chemical element).
